content: The Bush Administration released The Budget of the U.S. Government, Fiscal Year 2008 on February 5, 2007, containing detailed budget information, policy proposals, and economic forecasts for FY2007 through FY2012. Limited information on budget policies for FY2012 through FY2017 is also included.
